mapper.sql: ID, organizationname, organizationtype, organizationno, status, creator, createtime, modifier, modifytime, DESC1, DESC2, DESC3, DESC4
mapper.insert: insert into file_org (ID, organizationname, organizationtype, organizationno, status, creator, createtime, modifier, modifytime, DESC1, DESC2, DESC3, DESC4) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifytime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{desc1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desc2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desc3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desc4,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update file_org
organizationname = #{organizationname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
organizationtype = #{organizationtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
organizationno = #{organizationno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modifytime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
DESC1 = #{desc1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESC2 = #{desc2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESC3 = #{desc3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESC4 = #{desc4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update file_org set organizationname = #{organizationname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organizationtype = #{organizationtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organizationno = #{organizationno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modifytime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DESC1 = #{desc1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESC2 = #{desc2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESC3 = #{desc3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESC4 = #{desc4,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select fo.ID ID, fo.organizationname organizationname, fo.organizationtype organizationtype, fo.organizationno organizationno, fo.status status, fo.creator creator,fo.createtime createtime, (select count(*) from trwuliu_users tu where tu.orgid = fo.ID) count from file_org fo
and fo.organizationname like "%" #{organizationname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%"
and fo.organizationtype like "%" #{organizationtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%"
and fo.organizationno like "%" #{organizationno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%"
and fo.status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by fo.createtime desc
limit #{start,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{limit,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select count(1) from file_org
and organizationname like "%" #{organizationname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%"
and organizationtype like "%" #{organizationtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%"
and organizationno like "%" #{organizationno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} "%"
